title: helping elderly?
text:
extremely unsure if this has been posted or asked but, 

Does anyone know of a service to help the elderly in this time? or in general, people high risk to infection at all? I lost all my jobs and with this free time I really just want to help in any way I can. 

its not like there's a website called 
" i'm old help me" or "i have young children, relieve us of strife" 

so yee, if you know something lemme know, that's all i'm askin
